issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
1) Open studio
2) go to preferences click on  check for Titanium Updates--> install 
3) Have got an error message 
Error encountered during update Error extracting zip file - /var/folders/7q/57wdnnwj1z52pnwpzhj0fd280000gn/T/mobilesdk-3.0.2.GA-osx archive is not a ZIP archive'



h3. Actual Result
Error encountered during update Error extracting zip file - /var/folders/7q/57wdnnwj1z52pnwpzhj0fd280000gn/T/mobilesdk-3.0.2.GA-osx archive is not a ZIP archive'

h3. Expected Result
update should happen

comments.body:
Hi Praveen,

Please can you post the log at Help -> Titanium Studio -> View Log File

Thanks!
